    415, 4294, 2211, 2209, 2210, 413, 4289, 414, 4300, 2212, 4338, 2215, 428, 4337, 2213, 2216, 4335, 4171, 2222, 4342, 2217, 430, 4331, 2218, 4329, 4330, 2234, 4345, 2220, 435, 2230, 2229, 447, 448, 451, 2226, 578, 427, 2235, 2214, 4334, 4336, 436, 4326, 2221, 4325, 2350, 445, 4324, 2224, 449, 2225, 2228, 4343, 4344, 1968, 444, 453, 454, 458, 1967, 457, 2356, 2363, 455, 2362, 2370, 440, 1973

# Interloper thematic regions

# Iraq-e Ajam
uach_tr_0 = { 4300, 2212, 4338, 2215, 414, 2210, 2209, 413, 4342, 2217 }

# Fars

# Samarkand
uach_tr_7 = { 453, 454, 2363, 442, 455, 441, 1973, 440, 2362, 2370 }

# Provinces bordering the various thematic regions
